name: Magnatron
overview: Game design & coding by Stuart Meek and Chris Leathley. Graphic routines by Chris Leathley. Music by Rod Utting (Aquila Audax). Aliens have begun a structured, methodical attack on the inner solar system while using the asteroid belt for cover and concealment. Earth calls into servicethe small fleet of building drones, defense forces and artificially intelligent Magentron device. The only chance is for the Magnetron to use the alien weapons against them. We can only hope it is skilled enough to defend us while we reposition our forces. Once Magnetron is gone, Mars is as good as gone.
